verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: On Monday ’s edition of The View] , [ARG0: co - host Whoopi Goldberg] [V: noted] [ARG1: the president touted a new Reuters - Ipsos poll that showed a growing approval rating for Trump among blacks . The View crew refused to acknowledge that was any evidence at all for improvement in the black community , even the record - low black unemployment rate of 6.6 percent , which was announced on Friday] .

On Monday ’s edition of The View , co - host Whoopi Goldberg noted [ARG0: the president] [V: touted] [ARG1: a new Reuters - Ipsos poll that showed a growing approval rating for Trump among blacks] . The View crew refused to acknowledge that was any evidence at all for improvement in the black community , even the record - low black unemployment rate of 6.6 percent , which was announced on Friday .
